note.p: Education: St Thomas's Hospital; Dublin; Paris; Berlin; Gottingen; Edinburgh

Career: Articled to Mr Travers, St Thomas's Hospital, London; Assistant Surgeon (1839), then Surgeon (1848-1873), St Thomas's Hospital, London; Professor of Anatomy and Surgery, Royal College of Surgeons, London; retired to Sevenoaks (1873)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1894 vol 56 pp i-iii signed by J S B
